channel.title: Null Spammer
channel.description:
Ok i was just getting my server spammed by nulls I guess it what that polygomy program that someone release or w/e But heres a pic of what it looks like [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/v8hl44.jpg[/img]
How can i stop this from happening?
Btw, I've even added their ip to the banip list..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 01:10:35 am[/size][hr]Aww comeon, 14 Views no post :mad: Can't someone help? Ya'll know how it sucks to get your server spammed, why can't you help a helpless person :(
P.S. Sorry about the double post

item.title: Null Spammer
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

You could just, exit out of it and never run it again.
